title: Tình Nhân (情人-Lover)
lyrics: Tone Yǎn sè shì huàn jué. Yǒng chí biān nǐ dí shēn yǐng gōu chéng xiàn Wēn rè wàn yán. Duō shǎo gè wǔ yè Sì wú jì dàn. Zuì mèng hān huān. Wú yì zhuī zhú. Wú fǎ zhǐ bù Rè dù bāo wéi liǎo wǒ All I wanna do is fool around Wǒ dí xīn zài xiǎo lù luàn zhuàng Cóng rì luò dào qīng chén dí yuè guāng Bào nǐ dào tiān liàng Nǐ qīng qīng yī gè wěn Wǒ fēng kuáng tǐ huì Qì fēn kāi shǐ shēng wēn. Wēi xiǎn yòu mí rén I really wanna dance tonight Feel a little bit dangerous Shǎo liǎo xiē ān quán gǎn. Zuò wǒ dí qíng rén. I know you want it Diào luò rén jiān nǐ xiàng qiū bǐ tè cì yú wǒ dí shǒu xuǎn Kào zài zhěn biān Ah guāng rào guò nǐ tiān shǐ bān dí liǎn. Ah zhè gǎn jué shí zài tài wēi xiǎn Néng fǒu zài duì wǒ wēn róu yī diǎn diǎn. Bù rěn xīn zài dài nǐ qù mào xiǎn All I wanna do is fool around Wǒ dí xīn zài xiǎo lù luàn zhuàng Cóng rì luò dào qīng chén dí yuè guāng Bào nǐ dào tiān liàng Nǐ qīng qīng yī gè wěn Wǒ fēng kuáng tǐ huì Qì fēn kāi shǐ shēng wēn. Wēi xiǎn yòu mí rén I really wanna dance tonight Feel a little bit dangerous Shǎo liǎo xiē ān quán gǎn. Zuò wǒ dí qíng rén. I know you want it Guài zhè gǎn jué kuáng rè. Dēng guāng huǎng liǎo Yīn lè fàng zhuó. Gǎn shòu tǐ wēn shàng shēng Zhuāng huā liǎo. Nǐ huǎng zhuó I know u really wanna. You know u really wanna Nǐ qīng qīng yī gè wěn Wǒ fēng kuáng tǐ huì Qì fēn kāi shǐ shēng wēn. Wēi xiǎn yòu mí rén I really wanna dance tonight Feel a little bit dangerous Shǎo liǎo xiē ān quán gǎn. Zuò wǒ dí qíng rén. I know you want it
